channel.title: Comments on: Website Launch for Family Law Firm
channel.description: The best new WordPress Genesis things

item.title: By: Clayton Collie
item.dc:creator: Clayton Collie
item.description: We migrated the site from a large company that gives blanket templates to all of it's clients. The launch of the website was a culmination of a rebranding that we helped the firm through since the fall of 2015. New logo, new headshots, new press releases and advertising spots. The website was the final piece to show the firm has grown and changed management and it is now a more modern take on helping families through tough times.
item.content:encoded: We migrated the site from a large company that gives blanket templates to all of it’s clients. The launch of the website was a culmination of a rebranding that we helped the firm through since the fall of 2015. New logo, new headshots, new press releases and advertising spots. The website was the final piece to show the firm has grown and changed management and it is now a more modern take on helping families through tough times.
